alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 11 at 4:15AM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes U.S. Highways 70, 82, and 380.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
